headline: Is AbbVie the Best Dividend Stock in Big Pharma Today?
summary: AbbVie Inc. (NYSE:ABBV) is one of the best dividend stocks for a bear market. The company holds the title of a Dividend King, having raised its dividend for 52 straight years. That kind of track record makes a dividend cut highly unlikely, as it would break the streak and potentially take decades to regain entry […]
